title: Airbus - worldwide aircraft deliveries 2002 to 2019
summary: In general Number of aircraft deliveries has rose over the Year.
Number of aircraft deliveries is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2005 and 2006.
Maximum Number of aircraft deliveries, about 635.0 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Number of aircraft deliveries about 378.0 was reached at Year 2005
